section.title: RP 9 part 1
section.paragraph: The review problem set for today contains four review problems.
This first problem is about higher-order functions and uses closures and anonymous functions. This problem is randomized. You must solve it correctly three times in a row.

section.title: RP 9 part 2
section.paragraph: This problem is about higher-order functions and scoping rules. It uses closures and anonymous functions.

section.title: RP 9 part 3
section.paragraph: This problem uses the same code as the previous problem and illustrates the same topics.

section.title: RP 9 part 4
section.paragraph: This problem uses the same code as the previous two problems but focuses on the difference between static and dynamic binding rules.
